name: Pangamia
description:
Pangamia is a 3D platform game where we control Wheelie, a friendly Pangolin with the ability to jump and transform into a ball.

The player will have to overcome a lot of obstacles and reach the finish line in the best possible time.

Can you get over it?

----

Pangamia was born as a final year project and had a development of four months.

GameMakers 5.0 winner organized by CpaSalduie.
